page.title: 05THE FOUR SEASON CENTRE
page.content: { {THE FOUR SEASONS SHOPPING CENTRE}IS LARGE AND FEATURES MANY SHOPS.IT HAS THE MAIN SHOPS SUCH AS LITTLE WOODS,CHELSEA GIRL,W.H.SMITHS,BOOTS, VICKERSTAFFS,BURTONS,DEBENHAMS,MARTINS ,REVOLVER,JEFFS,DIXONS,THE CO-OP, ZODIAC TOYS AND RUMBELOWS.ALSO IT HAS CHILDREN'S RIDES,FOUNTAINS AND SMALL GARDENS.IT HAS SEATS FOR OLD PEOPLE AND A MULTI-STORY CAR PARK. OUTSIDE IT HAS A SMALL MARKET WITH MARKS AND SPENCER'S, WOOLWORTH'S AND THE BRITISH HOME STORES OPPOSITE IT. THE CENTRE HAS 3 MAIN ENTRANCES STOCKWELL GATE,WESTGATE AND ONE OUTSIDE TESCO'S NEAR THE BUS STATION. THERE IS A NEW CENTRE CALLED THE ROSEMARY CENTRE,WHICH FEATURES ARGOS,TRACK AND CASUALS AND FULHAM FROZEN FOODS.
